items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: All Season
items.description: Most common: Good handle on dry, wet or snow

items.title: Highway
items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

content.body:
### Shop 265/70R15 Tire Size
The 265/70R15 tires are fitted to light trucks, SUVs, and CUVs, and are available in various categories such as All-Terrain, Highway, Touring, All-Season, Sport, and Mud-Terrain. 265/70R15 sized tires are most commonly used on Nissan and Mitsubishi models from the mid-90s to mid-2000s.

Popular vehicles
1995-2000 Mitsubishi Montero
1999-2004 Nissan Frontier

All-terrain tires offer on- and off-road traction and are typically used by light trucks and SUVs. These types of tires can be used on tough terrains and can perform on the highways. Take a look at [General Grabber A/TX](https://simpletire.com/brands/general-tires/grabber-a-tx#v=1&tireSize=265-70r15&mpn=04504080000&pageSource=sizeCatalog&itemId=204282&curationSeq=1&curationPos=1&badge=Best%20rated&curationSource=top-pick-top-picks&pick=best-rated), Yokohama Geolander AT G015, or the Crosswind AT if you need a 265/70R15 sized all-terrain tire that can offer great performance on- and off-the-road.

Highway tires are commonly used on SUVs and light trucks that typically haul materials or run on highways and are required to do some off-roading. Consider buying the [Yokohama Geolander H/T G056](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-h-t-g056#v=1&tireSize=265-70r15&mpn=110105639&pageSource=sizeCatalog&itemId=116353&curationSource=none&productPos=20), Kumho Road Venture APT KL51, and Nexen Roadian HTX RH5 if you need a 265/70R15 sized highway-terrain tire.

Whether you need an all-terrain, highway-terrain, touring, or any other type of tire for your Mitsubisi Montero, Nissan, or any other SUV or light truck, SimpleTire has a wide range of 265/70R15 sized tires that meet your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
